legacy.full_text:
Measuring only 4.53" wide and 11.3" tall, the G22 can fit in the most compact spaces. 
   
Even with an ultra-compact chassis measuring only 10L in volume, the G22 delivers unparalleled performance. Take your gaming to the next level with a 13th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 Processor.

result.text: #China's central bank and financial regulators held a meeting on Friday to discuss key tasks that include real estate finance, credit lending, and debt risk resolution for financing platforms. The meeting underscored the need to coordinate credit lending in the final two months of this year and the beginning of next year to foster stable economic growth through consistent credit growth.
